resources.string: Use Mi Band to set, track, and follow your health and fitness data day and night.

"You're at your at your target weight."
"Congratulations! You're at your at your target weight."
Please pair with a Mi Band before set Alarm.
"Band will stop vibrating automatically when it detects you've gotten out of bed. Tap the band's sensor anytime to stop alarm manually. "
You are currently using the latest version.
Tap back key again to exit

"Sync steps and sleep info to qq health platform, you need available network."
Sign in to QQ and check your progress in the Health Center.
"Sync steps and sleep info to weibo sport platform, you need available network."
Login has expired, please bind again

"After link with your Wechat account and follow Mi Band's Wechat service account, you can check information like the number of steps taken through Wechat. You can also see your result status among your friends."
"Tap Link with Wechat to start, then tap Follow to complete sync."
Tap Generate QR code, generate and save a QR code in Gallery.
Tap Open Wechat, enter Scan QR code and tap Album to select the QR code saved.
Sync to share and compete with friends.
Mi Cloud will provide professional suggestions based on your activities and sleep performance.
Mi Band not paired, power unknown.
Please search again when you see one of the Mi Band lights flashes.
Bluetooth is not working properly, please try later.
最后一条数据为个人体重，不能删除
"Not %1$s? Touch to add a new user to the scale."
"Guest weigh-in history Touch to add a new user to the scale."
Do you realy want to abort this marking?
Mark today as a lazy day?
Pair Mi Band first and try again
Make Mi Band visible to other devices, it may use more power.
Your best record is to hit your goal for %1$s days.
Failed to share, please check storage left.
"%1$s lazy days left, personal record is %2$s days"
"User's health data will also be deleted. You can't reverse this action."
Please search again after tap Mi Band once it flashes.
Your fitness activity is visible to other users
Failed to connect, please pull to retry.
Make sure your Mi Band has enough power.
Failed to sync, pull to refresh.
"Are you sure to logout? Connection will be lost after logout."
Power will lost quickly in finding Mi Band.
To pair, step onto the scale
Less than one day from first use.
"When Mi Band's lights start flashing, tap a few times to pair."
Confirm to pair if two numbers are the same.
Firmware is the software system operates Mi Band device.
Update firmware can improve Mi Band performance. It also will support device to run new features.
Please always make sure device power stays above 5%, and Mi Band is properly connected with phone during update process.
Why do I need to update firmware?
What to do when I failed to update?
"We are unable to update Mi Band when its power level is below 5%. Please charge. Mi Band will start updating automatically once its been charged."
Please connect to power while updating.
Sorry, firmware failed to update. This will disable a part of features.
Firmware update successfully, waiting to restart...
Make sure Mi Band stays close to your phone during process.
Please make sure your phone supports Bluetooth 4.0 or above version. You can find this out from your phone specs.
Only Android 4.4 and above version support Mi Band.
"Please make sure to charge your MI Band correctly. You will see green lights flash when it's charging."
If your Mi Band is paired with an existing phone or if your Mi Band is not close to your phone, please turn off

"You may reach out to our customer service for future assistance.
Customer service hotline: 400-100-5678 We are available from 8 am to 6 pm, Monday to Sunday."
Does your phone operating system meet requirement?
Has your Mi Band been fully charged?
Mi Band has paired with another phone?
Notice me if I miss incoming call in %s sec.
This notification need the app to run in background continuously.
"Please lock the Mi Fit app and add Mi Fit to the white list of the 3rd party manager if exists."
Please add Mi Fit to the white list of the 3rd party manager if exists.
Please enter your personal information. More details will help to get precise results.
Mi Fit uses this info to calculate other stats and provide other hints
"Take a look find out your work out progress"
"Steps count is less than 1/3 of your goal"
"Great job! You have hit your goal today."
"Power is very low. Please charge Mi Band."
More to do with Mi Band
"Place booth feet firmly in the center of the scale"
You can pair multiple devices with your scale
After you pair your device scale will sync your history automatically
Choose the units that will be used to calculate your weight
"When the light flashes in the pattern below, replace the scale's battery"
"When the light flashes in the pattern below, the scale's maximum weight has been exceeded."
Place the scale on a dry surface
Open the app and stay within 10m of the scale to sync
After you replace the battery, the scale we restart automatically.
Make sure to stand in the center of the scale.
No need to use your phone when you weigh-in
The name you entered is invalid
Help improve Mi Band by sending usage data to Huami Inc.
Connect your band and try again
Vibrate band if Bluetooth is connection is lost
Connect your band before you begin %s.
Too many nudges. Try again later.
Open Mi Fit > Friends > Add Friends > Choose QR code from Gallery
Share your activity info with your friends
"Can't measure figure for children less than 6"
Indicates light color for the progress of workout
Failed to obtain current version data.
Failed to login, please try again.
Failed to login, please check your time setting and use the time provided by network.
"Congratulations! You're at your at your target weight."
"Congratulations! You're at your at your target weight."
You need to lose %1$s to reach your goal
"Light sleep %1$s%2$s Slept in %3$s, woke up at %4$s."
"You are about to log out from current Mi Account. Would you like to continue?"
"Failed to sync, please check network connection. If you choose to exit, you will loss data that hasn't been synced. Are you sure to exit?"
Exit will disconnect Mi Band with your phone,
unlock screen feature will be no longer valid.
Name is too long, please change.
"We are about to clean up data from this Mi Band and reset it to factory settings. Are you sure to continue?"
Your phone will no longer have access to data from Mi Band once they are unpaired.
Once you unpair Mi Band with your phone, you may pair another Mi Band with it.
In addition, you are no longer able to unlock your screen with this Mi Band once you unpair them.
"Your phone can't connect to weight scale after unpair,"
you can connect other scales later.
Sorry, there are multiple Mi Bands nearby. You can try to move your Mi Band and phone at least 10 meters away from other Mi Bands, then search again.
We are unable to connect you to the network, please check your network connection.
Great job! You just made a new record.
"%1$s burned %2$s cal. Every new record gets you one step closer to a better self. Don't stop yourself, move forward."

Notice: the number after X means that the number of times you marked
Mi Band has been set up successfully.
"According to studies, we suggest you to do at least 40 minutes workout every day. It is about 8000 steps of walk."
"According to studies, we suggest you to do at least 60 minutes workout every day. It is about 12000 steps of walk."

Based on the info you provided, your normal weight is %1$s-%2$s%3$s.

After you weigh-in, the scale we keep track of your history automatically.
Set your goal after you weigh yourself.
Thanks for your time. Your feedback is important to us.
Not far from hitting your goal.
"Have a great plan? Take your first step."
Failed to share, please check storage left.
"In deep sleep stage for %1$shr and %2$smin, in light sleep stage for %3$shr and %4$smin. In sleep: %5$s. Awake: %6$s"
"Spent an average of %1$shr %2$smin in deep sleep stage and %3$shr %4$smin in light sleep stage. You slept in at around %5$s, the average awake time is %6$s."
"%1$s%2$s burned %3$s cal, and you saved %4$s gallons of gas. (thanks for protecting our earth) The highest record was %5$s, walked %6$s steps."
"%1$s, run %2$s %3$s, and you saved %4$s gallons of gas. (thanks for protecting our earth) The highest record was %5$s, walked %6$s steps."
"Total %1$s%2$s Burned %3$s cal. Highest daily record happened on %4$s, walked %5$s steps."
"Total %1$s, ran %2$s. %3$s Highest daily record happened on %4$s, walked %5$s steps."
You beat %s of Mi Fit users.
"The application hasn't been installed, unable to share."
"Please wake me up 30 minutes before set time. I would like to get up when my body is awake."
Stop collecting info when run is paused
Use GPS to keep track of your route.
You have run %s kilometers. It cost %s. The pace is %s.%s
Auto paused, switch to resume once running
Low media volum for kilometer speech, please adjust it in Music/Settings
Please update to Android 4.4 and an above version to support Mi Band.
"In order to use Mi Band, you need to update your phone system. Only Android 4.4 or above versions support Mi Band."
在%s的过程中，请确保手环和手机保持在5米的范围内，并且中间不要隔墙，以确保标注成功。
"手环与app连接断开，标注失败，请确保手环 与app在5米以内，且不隔墙,再次开始标注"
Your activity data will be collected
The user info you entered is invalid
Band paired, set Smart Lock now
This feature requires the Mi Fit app to be open in the background
2. Set Screen lock to pattern, PIN, or password
Please place your Mi Band very close to your phone.
If your phone is still locked, you can try to restart Bluetooth to see if this problem can be fixed.
If you are unable to restart Bluetooth, please go to System Settings->Security to forget current Mi Band. Then, please go to Mi Band app to reset Screen Unlock.
After rebooting your device, try using your Mi Band to unlock it.
Two steps to set up, allow Mi Band to unlock your screen.
Was Mi Band close enough to your phone?
What can I do if I am unable to unlock?
Unable to unlock screen with your Mi Band?
You can turn this feature on and off any time in Settings > Security > Screen security
You can turn this feature on and off any time in Settings > Lock screen > Unlock with Bluetooth device
Please pair with a Mi Band before set Screen Unlock.
Lock screen password has been successfully set up.
You have set to unlock your screen with this Mi Band.
Step 2) Set to unlock your screen with Mi Band.

Make sure the scale is close to your device throughout the entire pairing process.
"Make sure the scale is charged and hasn't run out of power."
Restart Bluetooth by turning it off and then on again in Settings.
"Make sure your scale isn't already paired with another device nearby."
Exit and reopen the Mi Fit App to connect to scale.
Is your scale too far away?
Is this scale paired with another device?
根据你提供的身体信息, 我们通过BMI指数计算得出你的体重不宜超过%1$s
Merge entries that are recorded less than 30 seconds apart
Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women.
BMI is a measure of body fat based on height and weight. The physical distribution of fat varies widely among different body types.
"Your scale won't be able to record your weight data."
"You've already paired your scale using another unit of measurement. Remove the scale's back battery cover and use the dial to adjust this setting."
Wait until the LED notification light blinks before stepping on the scale.
